0: Gorgeous bathrooms great views amazing concierge lounge
Super clean rooms with friendly staff and valet parking
Very good service in the restaurant
Concierge is excellent to help find our way around and every staff member had a cheery welcome
The staff was very helpful removing the charge when called
Service was nice as expected the gym was good not great
Very modern hotel attentive staff and fantastic room view from the 30th floor
Dinner was also excellent especially the service
Service is consistently good as expected with the price tags their rooms carry
Staff in hotel bar was incredibly friendly
1: While the hotel was excellent the service and the room was not
We ordered room service 2 times in a row and we gladly enjoyed it
2: Not a good experience the sum of the parts are broken from concierge info to location to front desk to restaurant
The service is first class and they won me over in the first 10 minutes
I asked the bellhop for the nearest convenience store and he suggested I wait till morning to leave the hotel as it would not be safe to walk to thankful for this bellhops honest advice
The door to the ice machine was jammed and we had to call the front desk to have them open it
Not a complaint as the team were all very professional and pleasant just their systems appear to struggle with the task
Great hotel but baggage service prices need to be adjusted
I liked that fact that you can pick up a bottle at reception and use the filtered water dispenser to fill up
Also waited too long for beverage refill so service staff was adequate although polite
At more than 400 a night even for a tiny room would expect more solicitous service and desire to help
